data.name:
A data-driven approach to mobile
app retention
data.summary:
How has Covid-19 impacted the e-commerce and travel industries,

⦿ Uninstall benchmarks,

⦿ App retention across different city tiers,

⦿ Impact of number of sessions on app retention,

⦿ The right number of notifications required to retain a user, and

⦿ How effective messaging apps are as a marketing communication channel
data.speakers:
Kshitij Hastu
Growth Specialist, SEA at MoEngage

Pulkit Jain
Content Marketer at MoEngage
